Quick search

Poga Package¶

Note

Current Version

Poga: 0.1.10

YogaLayout: 1.19.0

How to install poga package?¶

pip install poga

from poga import *

def main():
   # use PogaLayout
   layout = PogaLayout(MyPogaView())
   # ...
   layout.apply_layout()

   # use capi directly
   node = YGNodeNew()
   YGNodeFree(node)

        width: float, width_mode: YGMeasureMode,

abstract set_frame_origin(x: float, y: float)¶

Set the frame position.

Parameters:

  • x (float) – The frame x position

  • y (float) – The frame y position

abstract set_frame_size(width: float, height: float)¶

Set the frame size.

Parameters:

  • width (float) – The frame width

  • height (float) – The frame height

abstract size_that_fits(width: float, height: float) → Tuple[float, float]¶

Calculate the frame size.

Parameters:

  • width (float) – Parent layout width.

  • height (float) – Parent layout height.

Returns:

Return frame size (width, height).

Return type:

Tuple[float, float]

abstract subviews() → Iterable[PogaView]¶

Return subviews, subview type must be PogaView.

Returns:

subviews

Return type:

Iterable[PogaView]

abstract subviews_count() → int¶

Return subviews count.

Returns:

subviews count

Return type:

int
